bibl.title: The Oldest Inscription on the Colossus of Memnon?
bibl.note: I. Memnon 84. Takes ]άτο[υ] in line 13 as the ending of a cardinal. Καῖσαρ refers to Augustus: this would imply that the inscription was inscribed between April 6, 21 B.C. through April 6, 11 B.C.
bibl.seg: SIJPESTEIJN P.J., The Oldest Inscription on the Colossus of Memnon?
I. Memnon 84. Takes ]άτο[υ] in line 13 as the ending of a cardinal. Καῖσαρ refers to Augustus: this would imply that the inscription was inscribed between April 6, 21 B.C. through April 6, 11 B.C.
